body.p: “Saw in Sleepy Hollow a small hickory stump about 6 inches in diameter & 6 inches high- so completely regularly & beautifully covered by that winkle like fungus in concentric circles & successive layers that the core was concealed & you would have taken it for some cabbage like plant. This was the way the wound was healed. The cut surface pf the stump was completely & thickly covered. “
